title: Advanced Diploma in Fundamentals of Manufacturing Processes
headline: Obtain advanced diploma and learn about fundamentals of manufacturing processes from this online course.
description: This free online diploma course on the Fundamentals of Manufacturing Processes offers a comprehensive guide to the different processes, applications, and terminologies of manufacturing processes. Learn about the effects of manufacturing processes on the mechanical properties of materials, as well as the advantages and limitations of manufacturing processes. So, begin this course today and enhance your knowledge of manufacturing processes.

courseDescription:
There are multiple types of processes that manufacturers can use to aid in the manufacturing of a product. Advanced Diploma in Fundamentals of Manufacturing Processes is a free online course that will teach you about the importance of new and innovative technologies that increase the productivity of a product. This course illustrates the fundamentals of manufacturing processes, materials, and procedures in developing a product that provides the desired service or experience.

This course begins by introducing you to the main purpose of manufacturing goods. You will learn about the different processes needed to achieve the desired features of a product. Furthermore, you will learn about the different types of metalworking processes as well as material removal processes. You will also learn about the processes for changing the chemical composition and coating processes.

This free online course will give you an in-depth understanding of the fundamentals of manufacturing processes. You will learn the importance of achieving the desired size, shape, and properties of a product. This course will be of great interest to individuals with an interest in the automobile industry and the aviation industry. Start this free course today and improve your knowledge of fundamentals of manufacturing processes.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this diploma course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this diploma course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison diploma is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital diploma: a downloadable diploma in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • diploma: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked diploma, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed diploma: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked diploma in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All diploma are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison diploma, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison diploma, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our diploma pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about the fundamental approaches to manufacturing, as well as the advantages and limitations of manufacturing processes. You will also discuss the material and manufacturing processes and the classification of manufacturing processes.
topics: Manufacturing Processes - Specific Advantages and Limitations

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about the selection and applications of manufacturing processes. You will also learn about the effects of these properties on the mechanical properties of materials as well as break-even analysis in manufacturing processes.
topics: Effects of Manufacturing Processes on Mechanical Properties

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to the different terminologies of the casting process. You will also discuss the steps involved in casting processes, pattern allowances, and the process of sand molding.
topics: Casting Processes - Steps and Terminology - Learning Outcomes
Casting Processes - Steps and Terminology - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about the factors that affect the properties of the moulding sand and the Gating System. You will also study the Core, Core Prints of casting, as well as the Yield and Riser Design.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about the process of cleaning castings. You will gain an understanding of the casting defect and their preventions. You will also learn about shell mould casting as well as investment and permanent mould casting.
topics: How to Maintain Castings - Learning Outcomes
How to Maintain Castings - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about the different types of metalworking processes that occur in manufacturing. You will discuss various types of presses used in metalworking processes and the types of forging processes. You will also study the torque and power consumption required in the rolling process as well as extrusion and wire drawing processes.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you learn about different shearing operations in sheet metal processes. You will also study the mechanical properties desired in dies and punches that make them perform at an optimal level.

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Advanced Diploma in Fundamentals of Manufacturing Systems - First Assessment
modules.description: You must score 80% or more to pass this assessment.

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Material Removal Processes - Cutting & Chip Formation
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about the mechanism of metal cutting and the process of chip formation. This includes the different types of chips in the material removal process as well as the different sources of heat generation during the metal cutting process. You will also learn about power consumption, tool failure and tool life.
topics: Material Removal Processes - Cutting & Chip Formation - Learning Outcomes
Types of Chips and Power Consumption
Material Removal Processes - Cutting & Chip Formation - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Material Removal Processes - Cutting Fluids & Grinding
modules.description: In this module, you will further be introduced to different material removal processes. You will discuss the various options of tool materials available. You will learn about the types and functions of cutting fluids. You will also learn about the grinding process and the different mechanisms involved.
topics: Material Removal Processes - Cutting Fluids & Grinding - Learning Outcomes
Material Removal Processes - Cutting Fluids & Grinding - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn the fundamentals of joining metals and welding processes. You will also learn about the processes of brazing and soldering, as well as determining the weldability of metals/materials.
topics: The Process of Joining Metals - Learning Outcomes
The Process of Joining Metals - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about the mechanisms and principles of heat treatment. You will also learn about heat treatment processes, the annealing process, and different applications of tempering.
topics: Fundamentals of Heat Treatment - Learning Outcomes
Fundamentals of Heat Treatment - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about improving surface properties through surface modification processes. You will also discuss processes for changing the chemical composition and coating processes for improving surface properties.

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Advanced Diploma in Fundamentals of Manufacturing Systems - Second Assessment
modules.description: You must score 80% or more to pass this assessment.

modules.name: Module
topics: Advanced Diploma in Fundamentals of Manufacturing Systems - Course Assessment
